body:
Please compare (3) and (4): mu and sigma are scalars while beta and gamma
are vectors.

This means beta and gamma should have one more rank compared to mu and
sigma.

If you consider batch_size as well, mu and sigma should have size
(batch_size) while beta and gamma should have size (batch_size, gamma).
